tag_list: gary, mindjamz, tony-robbins, positive-thinking, affirmations, self-improvement, personal-development
overview:
Gary is an extremely positive person with an energy that’s contagious.

Gary works constantly to improve himself, is a dynamic person, extremely coachable, dedicated and very, very disciplined. It’s his nature to be an over achiever, his presentations cover steps for improving quality of life. His passion for what he does is inspiring and his approach to life is encouraging and impressive.
